channel.title: Planet+AI Art
channel.description: Standout Entries for the 2022 Planet+AI Art Challenge

item.title: Seperation
item.description:
Seperation
by Helen W.

This submission is for the 2022 Planet+AI Image Challenge themed on Imagining Mars Sample Return.

The top part of the Mars Ascent Vehicle opens so that the collected Martian samples can be loaded into the sample return capsule for retrieval by the Earth Return Orbiter.

item.title: Perseverance
item.description:
Perseverance
by Helen W.

This submission is for the 2022 Planet+AI Image Challenge themed on Imagining Mars Sample Return.

The Perseverance rover has been collecting samples on Mars.

item.title: Watching Mars Sample Entry
item.description:
Watching Mars Sample Entry
by Helen W.

This submission is for the 2022 Planet+AI Image Challenge themed on Imagining Mars Sample Return.

According to the current plan, the Earth Return Orbiter will release the Earth Entry capsule on an Earth entry trajectory upon approach to Earth. Then, the capsule will land in the Utah desert.

item.title: Copter Flying on Mars
item.description:
Copter Flying on Mars
by Alice Z.

This submission is for the 2022 Planet+AI Image Challenge themed on Imagining Mars Sample Return.

According to the current plan, two Ingenuity-like helicopters will be as backup for the Perseverance to deliver collected samples to the Sample Retrieval Lander.

item.title: Back to Earth
item.description:
Back to Earth
by Helen W.

This submission is for the 2022 Planet+AI Image Challenge themed on Imagining Mars Sample Return.

According to the current plan, the Earth Return Orbiter will release the Earth Entry capsule on an Earth entry trajectory upon approach to Earth. Then, the capsule will land in the Utah desert.

item.title: Perseverance on Mars
item.description:
Perseverance on Mars
by Skylar V. and Ping W.

This submission is for the 2022 Planet+AI Image Challenge themed on Imagining Mars Sample Return.

The Perseverance rover has been gathering samples on Mars since Feb 18, 2021.

item.title: First Rocket Launch from March
item.description:
First Rocket Launch from Mars
by Cynthia V. and Ping W.

This submission is for the 2022 Planet+AI Image Challenge themed on Imagining Mars Sample Return.

The Mars Ascent Vehicle will play a key role in the Mars Sample Return mission, launching into the orbit around Mars the samples gathered by the Perseverance rover from the ancient Jezero Crater floor.

item.title: Return Capsule
item.description:
Return Capsule
by Cynthia V. and Ping W.

This submission is for the 2022 Planet+AI Image Challenge themed on Imagining Mars Sample Return.

NASA’s images used to create this digital image:

  1. Mars Earth Entry System Aeroshell at Entry https://mars.nasa.gov/resources/27054/mars-earth-entry-system-aeroshell-at-entry/. The Mars Earth Entry System for the Mars Sample Return will contain the orbiting sample inside a disk-shaped vehicle with a heat shield for safe entry through the Earth’s atmosphere.
